org.pepstock.charba.client.defaults

Interface IsDefaultScales

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultChartScales, DefaultScales, ExtendedScales, Scales

    public interface IsDefaultScales
    Interface to define scales/axes object defaults.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IsDefaultScale getAxis(IsScaleId scaleId, AxisKind kind)
      Returns the default configuration for x axis.

    • Method Detail

      • getAxis

        IsDefaultScale getAxis(IsScaleId scaleId,
                       AxisKind kind)
        Returns the default configuration for x axis.
        Parameters:
        scaleId - the scale id to use to get the default
        kind - axis kind to use if the scale id is not recognizable
        Returns:
        the default configuration for x axis.
